backend/main.mo: Actor managing access control, user profiles, projects, tasks, and associated stats using OrderedMap and role‑based permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two optimistic‑UI React Query features to the file useQueries.ts with metadata and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like listing summarizing the purpose of each major frontend file, including components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, start URL, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.ts: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, navigation fallback, and cache cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, section navigation, task page routing, dark mode, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/CreateProjectDia: Dialog component for creating a new project with name, icon, and color selection, submitting via useCreateProject.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating tasks with title, description, date, project assignment, and priority using useCreateTask.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays empty-state UI for no projects or tasks and provides a project creation button when applicable.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation controls, date navigation, user menu, and section switching.
frontend/src/components/HistoryPage.tsx: Page showing searchable, sorted history of completed tasks with project info and task click handling.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt logic handling browser events, iOS fallback, and user dismissal or acceptance.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login screen with hero branding, feature cards, and a button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/LongFormTaskEdit: Provides a rich text editor for long-form task descriptions using ReactQuill with custom toolbar options.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Chooses and displays the day, week, or month view based on the current view mode and selected date.
frontend/src/components/OverviewPage.tsx: Displays productivity insights and statistics, loading states, and fallback messaging when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal prompting the user to enter and save their display name during initial setup.
frontend/src/components/ProjectsOverview: Lists all projects with expand/collapse behavior, project creation, deletion, and nested task listings.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the sidebar component.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays an individual task with completion toggling, editing, deletion, drag handle support, and overdue styling.
frontend/src/components/TaskDrawer.tsx: Sidebar drawer listing active tasks with search, quick-add, and selection handling. Fetches tasks and projects, filters by search, and allows creating and selecting tasks.
frontend/src/components/TaskEditDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s title, description, due date, project, and priority. Saves updates through mutation hooks and syncs state when opened.
frontend/src/components/TaskPage.tsx: Full-page task editor with long-form content, due date, project selection, and priority controls. Loads a task, tracks unsaved changes, and saves updates via API mutations.
frontend/src/components/views/DayView.ts: Displays tasks for a single day grouped into overdue, upcoming, and completed, with sorting by priority. Supports opening tasks and creating new ones.
Monthly calendar view showing tasks per day with indicators for overdue and priority ordering. Allows selecting days or opening the first task of a day.
frontend/src/components/views/WeekView.t: Weekly grid showing tasks for each day sorted by priority and overdue status. Supports selecting tasks and creating new tasks via a floating button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout methods, and initializes AuthClient with stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, projects, and tasks using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles including color variables, dark mode, scrollbar styling, and Quill editor customization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing optimistic UI goals for task completion and known flicker issues.
